title: Dragons: The Champions of 1941 - Part 5
description: Chaos has dominated 1941, but help is finally at the war hero Sass, ambassador of the Saa race, is returning to Newfoundland. Sent to the new world alongside a powerful entourage, Alex, Stephanie and Strong must escort their longtime dragon friend on the final leg of her journey –– a mission that no one believes will be easy. After a year marred by violence, the faceless enemies of the Champions are ready to launch one more brutal assault, and this time, someone very dear will certainly be killed.
author: Kenneth Tam
